data.headline: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, and Russell 2000 all trade modestly higher in early futures actionTraders focused on upcoming jobless claims, existing home sales, and major earnings reports from Airbnb, Applied Materials, Coinbase, DraftKings, and HyattShopify and Micron rally in premarket tradingModerna and Robinhood decline ahead of the openOil prices rise amid escalating U.S.-Iran tensionsUS dollar weakens ahead of tomorrow’s CPI release
bullets: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, and Russell 2000 all trade modestly higher in early futures action
